tweet.text: Current or recent grad student specializing in the history of U.S. foreign economic policy? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications open Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: https://t.co/9MdLicfclR https://t.co/JlV44Fi47y
tweet.html: Current or recent grad student specializing in the history of U.S. foreign economic policy? Apply to the Presidential Management Fellows Program for a chance to work on the #FRUS series. #PMF applications open Sept. 28 to Oct. 12: bit.ly/OH-PMF
